data.actual_result: It won't send a single emoji, but just break the one placed in the middle as a code
data.expected_result: It should send the emoji that is placed in the middle, as it indicates that it is a emoji
data.short_description: Emoji inside emoji will indicate that the one inside of the emoji text, counts as a emoji but will still send the code
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message with a random emoji - Somewhere in the middle of that emoji text, put another emoji
